definition: politburo
political/politics/government
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
narrow
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc
political climate

sentences.english: That newspaper has a very good analysis of the political situation.
sentences.chinese: 这份报纸对政治局势作了很好的分析。

sentences.english: This was Politburo-style innovation and was laughable.
sentences.chinese: 这是类似政治局决策机构似的创新，非常可笑。

sentences.english: Moody’s said another reason was Japan’s political situation.
sentences.chinese: 穆迪表示，另一个原因是日本的政治局势。

sentences.english: BEIJING — The Chinese Communist Party has long cherished competitive sports as a conduit for geopolitical détente.
sentences.chinese: 中共向来把竞技体育作为缓和地缘政治局势的途径。

sentences.english: The development of the Northern Dynasty literature is closely related to the political situation at that time.
sentences.chinese: 北朝文学之发展，与当时政治局势密切相关。

sentences.english: Li Changchun, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee will attend and address the opening ceremony of the Forum.
sentences.chinese: 中共中央政治局常委李长春将出席论坛开幕式并致辞。

sentences.english: By comparison, the head of the Ministry of Public Security is a member.
sentences.chinese: 与此相比，中国的公安部部长却是中央政治局委员。

sentences.english: The power of approval should be in the hands of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee, not the Ministry of Finance.
sentences.chinese: 这个批准权不应在财政部，而应在中央政治局。

sentences.english: The plenary session manages by Central Political Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 全会由中央政治局主持。

sentences.english: He commentated on the contemporary political situation.
sentences.chinese: 他就现代的政治局势做了评述。

sentences.english: It tells us the political situation of the world.
sentences.chinese: 它告诉我们世界政治局势。

sentences.english: Plenary session presided over by the Central Political Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 全会由中央政治局主持。

sentences.english: Second, it is essential to maintain political stability and unity.
sentences.chinese: 第二，要有一个安定团结的政治局面。

sentences.english: During this ENC congress, we analyze our political situation.
sentences.chinese: 大会期间，分析联邦政治局势形势’。

sentences.english: CCTV journalists travel with the president and politburo leaders;
sentences.chinese: 记者长随主席和政治局领导旅行。

sentences.english: This dilemma is really destabilizing for China's sociopolitical situation.
sentences.chinese: 这种困境成为当今中国社会政治局势的不安定因素。

general secretary (of the Communist Party)

party central committee
third plenum of a national congress of the Chinese Communist Party
Zhang Chunqiao (1917-2005), one of the Gang of Four
premier/prime minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
vice-premier/vice prime minister/deputy prime minister
Wang Hongwen (1935-1992), one of the Gang of Four
